The sequence numbering happens aut=
omatically; there's no setting
for it.

Make sure the case-sensitive, max-p=
ath-length, and
max-segment-length settings are correct for the file system=
.

The relevant code is in
org.archive.crawler.writer.MirrorWriterProcessor=
.DirSegment.addToPath
and
org.archive.crawler.writer.MirrorWriterProcessor.=
EndSegment.addToPath.
